mapper.insert: insert into manager (mgId, roleId, managerName, managerPsd, managerSex, Tel, Address, Comment) values (#{mgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roleid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{managername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{managerpsd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{managersex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update manager set roleId = #{roleid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, managerName = #{managername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, managerPsd = #{managerpsd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, managerSex = #{managersex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where mgId = #{mgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select mgId, roleId, managerName, managerPsd, managerSex, Tel, Address, Comment from manager
